metaTitle: SENDA DE LOS FLAMENCOS San Javier | From €455,000
metaDescription: Discover SENDA DE LOS FLAMENCOS in San Javier, Murcia. 3-bed Town Houses from €455,000. Modern construction, community pool, delivery May 2027.

content.heroIntro: Welcome to SENDA DE LOS FLAMENCOS, an exceptional residential development by MIMOSAN SPA ALLEE located in the heart of Parque del olivo, San Javier. This exclusive project offers 3-bedroom, 3-bathroom Town Houses with 124m² of modern living space on 202m² plots, priced from just €455,000. Designed for discerning buyers seeking quality, location, and value, each property features contemporary finishes, private parking, and access to premium community amenities. With delivery scheduled for May 1st, 2027, SENDA DE LOS FLAMENCOS represents a significant opportunity in one of Murcia's most sought-after locations. The development combines modern Spanish construction standards with international design sensibilities, appealing to both owner-occupiers and investment-minded buyers. San Javier's established international community, excellent healthcare facilities, and proximity to multiple Blue Flag beaches make this an ideal setting for families, professionals, and retirees seeking the Spanish lifestyle without compromise.

locationSection.intro: Parque del olivo in San Javier represents the perfect balance between peaceful Mediterranean living and convenient urban access. This prestigious area has emerged as a premier destination for international property buyers, offering tree-lined streets, modern infrastructure, and a vibrant expatriate community where English is widely spoken. San Javier itself benefits from strategic positioning between major Murcia amenities and the stunning Costa Blanca coastline. The region's micro-climate and established reputation for quality of life have driven consistent property appreciation, with values increasing 8% year-on-year. Residents enjoy seamless access to world-class healthcare, international education options, championship golf courses, and some of Spain's most beautiful beaches. The area's infrastructure development and growing commercial activity continue to enhance property values and lifestyle opportunities.
highlights: Beach: Multiple Blue Flag beaches within 20 minutes
Hospital: Regional hospital within 30 minutes, Private clinics available
Shopping: Mercadona, Lidl, Consum supermarkets locally
Schools: International schools with British curriculum options

propertyFeatures.intro: SENDA DE LOS FLAMENCOS Town Houses showcase contemporary Spanish design with premium finishes throughout. Each property benefits from MIMOSAN SPA ALLEE's rigorous construction standards, featuring energy-efficient systems, high-quality materials, and layouts optimized for modern family living. The development represents the latest evolution in Mediterranean residential design, with attention to detail evident in every specification. From robust structural foundations to elegant architectural elements, these homes are built to exceed Spanish building regulations and provide lasting value.
features: Communal swimming pool with landscaped areas
Fully fitted kitchen with quality appliances
Double glazing with thermal break technology
Storage room for additional storage needs
Modern bathroom fixtures and sanitary ware

content.investmentSection: SENDA DE LOS FLAMENCOS represents an astute investment opportunity in one of Spain's fastest-growing property markets. San Javier has demonstrated consistent appreciation with property values increasing 8% year-on-year, significantly outpacing many European markets. At €2,200 per square meter average, these Town Houses offer exceptional value—40% less than comparable properties on Spanish islands. The rental market remains robust, with similar properties commanding €800 weekly rental rates, generating attractive yields for buy-to-let investors. San Javier's trajectory as a preferred destination for international buyers, combined with infrastructure improvements and economic development, positions SENDA DE LOS FLAMENCOS as both a lifestyle choice and a sound financial investment.

Trusted developer: MIMOSAN SPA ALLEE with established market reputation

faqs.question: What is the price of properties in SENDA DE LOS FLAMENCOS?
faqs.answer: Properties start from €455,000 for 3-bedroom, 3-bathroom Town Houses with 124m² built area. This represents excellent value at €2,200 per square meter. Contact our sales team for current availability and flexible payment options.

faqs.question: When will SENDA DE LOS FLAMENCOS be completed?
faqs.answer: Completion and delivery is scheduled for May 1st, 2027. MIMOSAN SPA ALLEE provides a 10-year structural warranty covering all major works. Specific unit completion dates will be confirmed upon purchase agreement.

faqs.question: Who is the developer of SENDA DE LOS FLAMENCOS?
faqs.answer: MIMOSAN SPA ALLEE is the developer, bringing years of experience building quality residential developments throughout San Javier and the Murcia region. They maintain high construction standards and excellent customer relationships.

faqs.question: Is Costa Blanca a good place to buy property?
faqs.answer: Yes, absolutely. Costa Blanca offers excellent investment potential with established international communities, modern healthcare, and lifestyle amenities. San Javier specifically shows 8% year-on-year property appreciation with strong rental demand.

faqs.question: How far is SENDA DE LOS FLAMENCOS from the beach?
faqs.answer: Multiple Blue Flag beaches are within 20 minutes of SENDA DE LOS FLAMENCOS, providing easy access to water activities, beach clubs, and coastal dining. The Mediterranean lifestyle is at your doorstep.

faqs.question: Can foreigners buy property in Spain?
faqs.answer: Yes, foreign nationals can purchase property in Spain with few restrictions. Most international buyers find the process straightforward with proper legal representation. Our team can connect you with English-speaking legal advisors for guidance.

faqs.question: What amenities are near SENDA DE LOS FLAMENCOS?
faqs.answer: Excellent amenities nearby include: Mercadona, Lidl, and Consum supermarkets for daily shopping; Regional hospital within 30 minutes with private clinics available; Several championship golf courses; International schools with British curriculum; and diverse restaurants serving local and international cuisine.

faqs.question: What are the costs of buying property in Spain?
faqs.answer: Purchase costs include transfer tax (approximately 7-8%), notary fees (0.5-1%), registration fees, and legal advisor costs. Our team provides detailed cost breakdowns during consultations to ensure complete transparency.

faqs.question: Is SENDA DE LOS FLAMENCOS suitable for rental investment?
faqs.answer: Yes, excellent rental potential exists with similar properties in San Javier achieving €800 weekly rates. The established expatriate community and beach proximity drive consistent tourism and seasonal demand.

content.conclusion: SENDA DE LOS FLAMENCOS by MIMOSAN SPA ALLEE offers a rare combination of premium location, modern design, affordable pricing, and strong investment fundamentals. Whether seeking a permanent Mediterranean residence, vacation retreat, or rental investment, these 3-bedroom Town Houses deliver exceptional value in one of Spain's most desirable destinations. With May 2027 delivery approaching, availability is limited and securing your preferred plot is advisable. Contact our sales team today via WhatsApp or email to arrange a private viewing, discuss flexible payment options, and begin your journey to Spanish property ownership. Your dream Mediterranean lifestyle awaits at SENDA DE LOS FLAMENCOS.
